summary: An ordinance relating to and confirming a loan to the City of Seattle, in the sum of Sixty Thousand Dollars ($60,000.00) for the purpose of providing funds for the construction of additions and betterments to the Firlands Tuberculosis Hospital, authorized at an election held March 5, 1918, under and pursuant to Ordinance No. 38122; directing the issuance of general bonds of said city in said amount and providing for the levy of taxes for the payment of the principal and interest thereof.
